page.title: 14LANDSCAPING
page.content: {Britain in Bloom} Kenton has won the Cox Cup for Britain in Bloom in the South West region for the third successive time. We interviewed Kentons warden for the competition. He told us about gardening and judging. We are not surprised that Kenton has won three times as it is a very pretty village. There are lots of trees and the school has just planted a hedgerow of twenty-eight trees and bushes. Where ever you walk you always see flowers. The local restaurants have got hanging baskets with flowers hanging out of the sides as do many people. The warden explained that the design of the village would not give Kenton any chance of winning the International Competition against the rest of Europe.
